title: My Xayah fan art!
body:
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/101eK

Hi, my name is Liz, I'm a fairly new self taught artist and i just wanted to share my first League of Legends Fan Art! One of my favourite champs {{champion:498}}  :) I am going to be drawing {{champion:267}}  next!

replies.body: Very cool! I like this a lot. :D

It's not my preferred style, but your colors and shape are very clean and smooth. It looks nice. ^^

Keep it up! You should do a Yordle. :3
Here's my first one: https://sama-lass.deviantart.com/art/Keyboard-Warrior-Warwick-fan-art-FINISHED-716269581
This is really good, looks realistic. How long did this take you btw?

not sure if 'everyone' will see this, but i cant thankyou all enough for your kind comments, it means SO much to me you have no idea, and yes im new but i spend ALOT of time on my pieces haha! Overwhealmed by the comments, thankyou so much, i hope to improve and get even better!

I did the Nami one i mentioned, as well as some others, you can see them here :) My most popular one is Irelia! 

[Artstation](https://www.artstation.com/lizariyala)

also sorry for the late reply :c

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} I'm bottom-of-the-barrel rookie, and it's seeing results like this that keep me going and believing that one day I can be as good as people like you. Can't wait to see more!
thats a really nice thing to say, thank you so much and sorry for the late reply

Please do Soraka!! SS or Reaper.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Pure Beauty.. She needs to be an ARTIST!!! {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
Pretty Bird
way to go and I'm glad you are going to name she is my favorite support and I lowkey feel like she doesn't get the right amount of retention. :-)
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Your a very good artist I’m still learning everything still getting good at art although I’m a pencil on appear guy and have never been very much good at digital art and just something I noticed the perspective on the bird skull seems a bit odd
Awesome!!!  I can’t draw so I love stuff like this!!!
good job i like it continue

I'm so so impressed, expected a decent drawing but that just blows my mind.. It's fantastic! :D
{{champion:498}}

Nice artwork!

Testing a fix to make the image show.

Edit: Nvm it didn't work.

> fairly new


are you fucking kidding me

Self taught?!? :O

THIS IS AMAZING!!! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
We watch your career with great interest.
This is awesome ^_^
I wish people would draw Anivia D;
pretty freakin amazing.. well done!
Beautiful, awesome job :0
Better than the splash! Nice job :)
THAT is beautiful!
I love the effect on her feathers. Looks really nice.
That's awesome! I wish I could draw/paint like that U.U
I wish I had that talent. half that talent. how long have you been drawing for?
"new" to drawing? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} looks so pro

Very well done! If you're doing {{champion:267}} best girl next, can you do her River Spirit skin? Pretty please!?

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
This is amazing!
This is awesome! Love the style of the art
Looks great! I love the feeling of the piece, can't wait for Nami!! :){{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Very nice!
Wow!
Good Job :)
Wow! Well done, that is very good!
Great draw, love the hand+feathers
